/** * The counterpart of {@link OutgoingStream} on the receiving side. * * Data streamed in can (and should) be persisted, but must not be included in the table's * live data set until added by {@link StreamReceiver}. If the stream fails, the stream receiver will * delete the streamed data, but implementations still need to handle the case where it's process dies * during streaming, and it has data left around on startup, in which case it should be deleted. */
